## For loop

### Perform a task a for a certain number of values

<img src="Images/ForLoop.png" style="width: 400px;"/>

---

## For loop

```{r}
for(i in 1:4){
  
  j <- i + 10
  print(j)
  
}
```

---

## For loop
```{r}
for (year in c(2010,2011,2012,2013,2014,2015)){
  print(paste("The year is", year))
}
```
